title: The Consultant
description:
The Mogul: Book #2 in The Chronicles of Nina Sharpe, Call Girl  

If success means getting paid for what you love to do, Call Girl Nina Sharpe has made itâ€¦.

 After my first year on the job, I had a million dollars in my bank account and real security for the first time in my life. However, that money was pocket change to my latest client, Adam Grubman, the richest man in online gaming. Adam needs sexual healing to turn him from mogul behind the keyboard to master in the bedroom. Fortunately, I'm just the woman for the job. But when our private sexts threaten to turn into an internet sensation, all hashtags break loose. And when Adam wants to turn our week-long tryst into a permanent gig, love might get in the way of my perfectly good business. 

This is my story. Don't try this online.
author: Jayne Blue
